src:
FOTO: Kakšen preobrat v Kmetiji, največja taktika premagana
Jan in Tilen sta skupaj z Božo izgubila dvoboj.
01 Nov 2019, 20:10 by S. N.



Tanja v solzah. FOTO: Zaslonski posnetek



Arena dvobojevalcev. FOTO: Zaslonski posnetek



Arena dvobojevalcev. FOTO: Zaslonski posnetek



Jok, ko so mislili, da se bosta poslovila dvojčka. FOTO: Zaslonski posnetek


V areni, ki so jo poimenovali kar arena presenečenja, se je zgodil dvoboj posebne sorte. Pomerili so se dvojčka Tilen in Jan z Božo proti Danijelu z Marjano. Z dolgimi palicami so nosili lonce, zanesljivo pa sta zmagala Danijel in Marjana, kar je spravilo v solze večino bivajočih na kmetiji, najbolj pa Tanjo. A potem je voditeljica povedala, da je še ena možnost, da nekdo ostane na posestvu. Na vprašanje, kdo si ne želi, da ostane Boža, so brez oklevanja vsi razen Marjane dvignili roko. »Lahko midva prepustiva mesto Boži?« je vprašal Jan, Natalija pa mu je odvrnila: »Ne.« Tako se je poslovila le Boža, dvojčka pa kljub porazu ostajata v Kmetiji.


Arena dvobojevalcev. FOTO: Zaslonski posnetek



Arena dvobojevalcev. FOTO: Zaslonski posnetek



Jok, ko so mislili, da se bosta poslovila dvojčka. FOTO: Zaslonski posnetek
text:
PHOTO: What a Turn in the Farm, Biggest Tactics Overcome
Jan and Tilen lost a duel with Bozo.
01 Nov 2019, 19:10 by S.N.



Thins in tears. PHOTO: Screenshot



Arena duelers. PHOTO: Screenshot



Arena duelers. PHOTO: Screenshot



Crying when they thought the twins would say goodbye. PHOTO: Screenshot


In the arena, dubbed the "surprise arena", a match of a special kind happened. The twins Tilen and Jan moved with Bozo towards Daniel with Marjana. They used to carry pots with long sticks, and they were sure to win over Daniel and Marjana, which made most of those staying on the farm tear down, most notably Tanja. But then the manager said there was another option for someone to stay on the property. When asked who did not want to remain Bozo, everyone except Marjana raised her hand without hesitation. “Can we pass the place of Christmas?” Jan asked, and Natalia replied, “No.” Only Boza said goodbye, and the twins remain in the Farm despite their defeat.


Arena duelers. PHOTO: Screenshot



Arena duelers. PHOTO: Screenshot



Crying when they thought the twins would say goodbye. PHOTO: Screenshot
